title: Ловець снів
overview: When life crumbles in front of our eyes, dreams of personal happiness collapse, and the accumulated problems lead to a dead end, he comes to the rescue. Dream catcher. A person who is able to solve the most hopeless life situations. A genius specialist whose main tool in his work is our dreams. He will destroy the stereotypical interpretation of dreams and prove that sleep is the key to solving our problems. You just need to read it correctly.
